To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeStarsInSouth _threestarsinsouth;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threestarsinsouth = ThreeStarsInSouth(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threestarsinsouth.IsReady)
{
    var period = _threestarsinsouth.Period.Value;
    var current = _threestarsinsouth.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threestarsinsouth = self.ThreeStarsInSouth(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threestarsinsouth.IsReady:
    period = self.threestarsinsouth.Period.Value
    current = self.threestarsinsouth.Current.Value
